channel.title: Particl Desktop on Particl Project Wiki
channel.description: Recent content in Particl Desktop on Particl Project Wiki

item.title: Particl Desktop
item.description: About Particl Desktop Features Installation Creating a new wallet Staking Recommended for beginners and majority of users Preview of Particl Desktop 3.0 About Particl Desktop While it does not currently contain all advanced features (like Particl Core), Particl Desktop is a recommended wallet for majority of users. This wallet is intended to be the centerpiece and default wallet of the Particl platform and is heavily under development.
